plot: Khloé is forced to examine her insecurities when she receives constant criticism about her weight gain from the media--and even members of her family. Can she learn to love herself and not worry about making everyone happy? Also, Khloé gets fed up having to clean up after her filthy hubby Lamar so she decides to give him a taste of his own medicine. But it's game on when Lamar refuses to give in and Khloé refuses to back down.—Guilherme O.
